category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MSE_load_related_product_process_plant
preference.preference_description: Automatically loads related structures (product, plant or process) when a product, plant or process is opened in Manufacturing Process Planner. Valid Values: true - Related structures are automatically loaded when opening a structure in Manufacturing Process Planner. false - Related structures are not loaded when opening a structure in Manufacturing Process Planner.
